summary: I AM HAVING TROUBLE WITH MY 1997 PLYMOUTH BREEZE, I TOOK IT TO A REPAIR SHOP AND WAS TOLD THAT IT IS THE HEAD GASKET.  I NEED TO KNOW IF THERE IS ANY KIND OF RECALL DUE TO THIS PROBLEM.  I WAS TOLD FROM THE REPAIR SHOP THAT IT IS VERY COMMON FOR THESE KIND OF VEHICLES TO HAVE THIS PROBLEM.  PLEASE ADVISE ME IF THERE IS ANYTHING I CAN DO.  THANK YOU FOR YOUR COOPERATION.
